Name: Seated Cable Row

Description: A machine-based exercise targeting the chest muscles.

Description: A rehabilitation exercise to strengthen the shoulder blades and improve posture.

Description: A rotator cuff rehabilitation exercise using a resistance band or dumbbell.

Description: A shoulder impingement rehabilitation exercise to improve mobility and reduce pain.

Description: An exercise to strengthen the scapular muscles and improve shoulder stability.

Description: A rehabilitation exercise for tennis elbow using a dumbbell.

Description: A stretching exercise to relieve tension in the forearm muscles.

Description: A rehabilitation exercise for golfer's elbow using a dumbbell.

Description: An exercise to improve forearm rotation and strength using a dumbbell.

Description: A stretching exercise to relieve tension in the hip flexor muscles.

Description: A strengthening exercise for the glutes and hamstrings.

Description: A strengthening exercise to target the hip abductors and improve groin stability.

Description: A stretching exercise to relieve tension in the groin muscles while standing.

Description: A seated stretching exercise to relieve tension in the groin muscles.

Description: A machine-based exercise targeting the groin muscles using an adductor machine.

Description: A strengthening exercise for the hamstrings.

Description: A gentle exercise to mobilize the lower back and pelvis.

Description: A rehabilitation exercise to improve ankle mobility.
